name: Santa Barbara Parks and Recreation Summer Camps

navigation_path.step1: From homepage, click 'Activities' in main navigation
navigation_path.step2: On Activities page, expand 'Youth' submenu (click + button)
navigation_path.alternative: Featured Topics > 'Sign Up for Classes and Camps' on homepage

data_hints.pricing_location: Individual camp pages linked from summer camps hub. Range: $4-$17.50/hour, most $12-15/hour per news article
data_hints.hours_location: Individual camp listings - half-day and full-day options available
data_hints.extended_care: Not mentioned on main pages - check individual camp listings
data_hints.topics: Art, business, engineering, performing arts, sports, water safety

special_notes: Site type: Government (City of Santa Barbara). Complex Drupal-based CMS with nested navigation structure. Summer camps page contains links to multiple partner organizations (e.g., Peak2Pacific, SB Zoo) that redirect externally. 15 camps total for 2026. Scholarships available via PARC Foundation and SBPAL Campership Alliance. Free Junior Counselor program for teens 13-17 to earn volunteer hours. Free Summer Fun program provides 7 weeks childcare for eligible families.
scraping_challenges: External redirects - some internal links redirect to partner camp websites
Cookie consent dialog on first visit
Camp listings may be paginated or dynamically loaded
